channel.name: Salesforce Proposal for Cloud Sync Expansion

messages.text: Hi James,Hope you had a great weekend. I’ve attached the formal proposal for theCloud Sync Expansion. Let me know if anything jumps out, or if you'd liketo walk through it together.
Perfect — happy to hop on a call or clarify anything if needed. I alsoincluded a few line-item breakdowns in the doc just in case leadershipwants more granularity.
Hey Bruce,Reviewed it with our VP — overall no red flags. One minor question on theonboarding costs. Can those be deferred until post-deployment?
Absolutely. We can structure it so onboarding fees kick in 30 days aftergo-live. I’ll update the proposal and resend it.
That’s perfect. I’ll forward that to finance — that change should check the last box. Appreciate the flexibility.
No problem at all. Revised version attached — let me know if anything else needs adjusting. Otherwise, we’re good to prep contracts.
messages.intent: send revised proposal, confirm readiness to proceed

messages.text: We can have draft contracts ready early next week. Happy to kick off implementation prep on our end as well. Excited to get this moving.
messages.intent: commit to contract, signal readiness for implementation

summary: The sales rep, Bruce, sent the Cloud Sync Expansion proposal. Prospect James raised a minor objection regarding onboarding costs, which Bruce accommodated. James confirmed satisfaction with the revised terms, leading Bruce to send the updated proposal and commit to drafting contracts and preparing for implementation, indicating deal progression.
